Steaks either rump, skirt or hanger in a single sIze but with different toppings or the likes of ribeye t-bone or fillet in different sizes are the thing. A pasta al pomodoro we ordered for my daughter, however, could not have been blander. The rabbit I ordered comprised some rather miscellaneous grilled pieces, again rather bland. If only it had been casseroled in a mustard sauce! The roast baby chicken my wife ordered was perhaps the best of an undistinctive bunch of dishes. Three breaded morcels of calves’ brain placed in a paper tube made for a peculiar starter. Unlike other branches an extensive list of pizzas was in the menu here. But none were available as the pizza oven wasn’t working. Service was so slow we decided to skip dessert and coffee.
147: Review: Bellissimo e particolare locale, situato vicino la stazione di Tottenham Court Road, bhe che dire, tutto ECCEZIONALE dalle patate arrosto alla fiorentina, fatevi consigliare e non ve ne pentirete, chiedete del cameriere Nicola col "baffetto ^_^ e la bravissima menager Angela, bel posto ci ritornerò...
148:
Review: Ottimo servizio,ottima carne,personale cordiale e gentile. 
Posto da visitare. 
Combinamento perfetto fra cibo e meccanica
149: Review: A new Italian restaurant a little bit off the beaten tracks. I came alone with no reservation, but they kindly found me a place to sit. Excellent pasta, good wine and a chat with the bartender. Go there!
150: Review: My sisters and I booked this restaurant during their soft opening period. There were three of us and they gave us a tiny table which probably be small for even two people. Luckily the weather was nice so they seated us outside. However we were forgotten about we had to ask for everything - menus, cutlery, drinks orders, condiments..the waiting staff clearly need more training. We ordered the sharing rib which was amazing perfectly cooked and meat of excellent quality. If it wasn't for the discount this place is really expensive.
151: Title: Early evening meal for three

Review: The restaurant had only just opened the previous week on a former Byron site which had before that been a petrol station, hence the male staff all in mechanic boiler suits. The restaurant specializes in meat dishes, mainly beef, but with some others, such as rabbit. The starters looked good but we were short of time so had entree and dessert. We had filet steak, hanger steak and a pizza. For dessert we had Latte Dolce Frito (which were divine), cheesecake and Tiramisu. All were very good. The staff were very friendly and attentive but not overpowering so. We will be going again.
152: Review: The place has just opened and if you are in the city center and want to eat some spectacular italian food, well this is the place. Super friendly staff and just the authentic italian food I had in while.Perfect for dates, business meeting and family lunch/dinner.
153: Title: Carne italiana di ottima qualità...

Review: Sono venuto di sera con la mia fidanzata e abbiamo preso una pizza in due, per provare questa particolarità del Macellaio RC Fitzrovia, una costata di 800g ed un piatto di purè di patate buonissimo... La pizza era buonissima e cotta alla perfezione, costata e purè idem. Infine abbiamo scelto come dessert un bianco al basilico e un tiramisù. Servizio cordiale e puntuale, rapporto qualità prezzo giusto.. torneremo di sicuro!
154: Title: Far too noisy for lunch

Review: Real shame as we enjoyed the food, service great but noise level was too uncomfortable for a comfy lunch. We couldnt carry on any conversation. Whether due to particularly loud music (strange choice for Sunday lunchtime) or the ridiculously loud table of Italians. The decor is and general buzz relaxed but tables in small space right on top of each other. Left after very nice pizza and beautiful gnocchi with beers. Wine appears very expensive. Will try it again as on our doorstep and meats do look lovely.
155: Title: A glittering little jewel in Fitzrovia

Review: This charming Italian restaurant in Fitzrovia is a must visit.Located in what used to be a old petrol station it screams excellence.From the moment you step inside the ambience envelopes you ...the fantastic wine list..the amazing fresh Italian choice of dishes and the decor.From cages full of wine to the quirky tables and chairs to the food..your senses are met with an unforgettable experienceThe service is perfection ...you are made to feel like familyNothing is too much botherAn amazing addition to an already well established group of restaurantsMacellaio Fitzrovia is the place to be
156: Title: The real Italian Fiorentina in London
Review: I'm from Italy and i can guarantee you that Fiorentina was the best meat have ever eaten! Awesome staff and a very large wine choice! 10/10! Braviii!!
157: Review: Personale gentilissimo ci hanno accolto in maniera splendida È stata la Fiorentina più buona che io abbia mai mangiato Lo consiglio a chiunque si trovi a Londra E sicuramente ci tornerò
